text: Oslo-Wichita LIVE is a live album by The Rainmakers, released in 1990. The album was recorded live November 22, 1989, in Oslo and January 20, 1990 in Wichita.Oslo-Wichita LIVE: The Rainmakers AllMusic The CD version of the album contains 1 additional bonus track. == Track listing == All tracks written by Bob Walkenhorst except where noted. # "Hoo Dee Hoo" – 5:17 # "Downstream" – 3:04 # "Reckoning Day" – 3:20 # "The Lakeview Man" – 3:45 # "Small Circles" – 4:10 # "One More Summer" – 4:00 # "Renaissance Man" – 4:11 # "Nobody Knows" (Steve Phillips) – 3:45 # "Tornado of Love" – 4:01 # "Shiny Shiny" – 3:25 # "Stick Together" – 4:31 # "Let My People Go-Go" – 4:18 Bonus track on CD # "Drinking on the Job" – 8:45 == Personnel == The Rainmakers *Bob Walkenhorst – lead vocals, guitar, keyboards *Rich Ruth – bass guitar, vocals *Steve Phillips – lead guitar, vocals *Pat Tomek – drums == References == Category:1990 live albums Category:Mercury Records live albums Category:The Rainmakers (band) albums
title: Oslo-Wichita Live
